q1: I was really sad about Argentina losing to France
a1: The best team won. It is sad for Argentina though.
q2: Who France going to face after they beat Argentina?
a2: How many players are in each team?
q3: France will play Uruguay. There are 11 players in each team
a3: There will be 11 players all game, as no red cards will be given out and France will win.
